sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Row, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, Input, InputGroupText, Button, DropdownToggle, DropdownItem, DropdownMenu, CustomInput, UncontrolledDropdown, } from 'reactstrap'; import { injectIntl } from 'react-intl'; import IntlMessages from '../../../../helpers/IntlMessages'; import { Colxx, Separator, } from '../../../../components/common/CustomBootstrap'; import Breadcrumb from '../../../../containers/navs/Breadcrumb'; const InputGroupsUi = ({ intl, match }) => { const { messages } = intl; return ( <> @ @example.com https://example.com/users/ $ .00 With textarea $ 0.00 $ 0.00 Upload Upload ); }; export default injectIntl(InputGroupsUi);
